title: Sci Fi Title Screen Music Volume One
description: This brand new series of 10 title screen tracks is made with the latest and most high quality sounds from around the world! Dive in today and take a listen to what Sci Fi Title Screen Music Volume 1 can offer you!
longDescription:
WELCOME TO SCI FI TITLE SCREEN MUSIC VOLUME 1 !

-

Short Overview:

Sci Fi Title Screen Music Volume 1 Presents 10 background music loops ready for your gaming productions! Over 22 minutes of audio provided with various styles & themes composed, to create tension & atmosphere for your Unreal Project.

-

Percussion Features:

All Percussion in this asset pack was recorded (sampled ) at Skywalker Sound Studio in California.

-

What can the music be used for?

( All of the following tracks are great for title screen style music, loading screens, character customisation & menu listings ) edit the music however you like to best fit your game.

-

Track Listing

  1. Down From The Sky
  2. Night Crawlers
  3. Death Machines
  4. Cyborg X
  5. The Fallen
  6. Night walkers
  7. Masters Of Orion
  8. Virus
  9. They Will Return
  10. Dying Skies


LISTEN HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-title-screen-music-sound-cloud-preview/s-cNKhwHrbMpT
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Tracks
  •  High quality instrumentation
  •  Various Styles & Themes
  • Mixed & Mastered
  • Not Available in (MP3) Unreal Engine Store Asset ONLY ( No other File Format download other than what is provided by the Unreal Store. ( See Audio Specs below )

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 22 minutes 44 Seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
